AAON Code of Business Conduct covers a wide
range of business practices and procedures. Itdoes not cover every issue that may arise, but setsout basic principles to guide our employees. All ofour employees must conduct themselvesaccordingly and seek to avoid even the appearanceof improper behavior. AAON provides The Code of
Conduct to the Company's agents and
representatives, including consultants. /g23/g38/g53/g15/g1F/g4A/g23/g53/g67
